demos.title: Vintage Clothing Store
demos.description: A curated vintage clothing shop with 15 products, complete with a spreadsheet inventory and product photos.

demos.title: Handmade Jewelry Notes
demos.description: Messy seller notes for a handmade jewelry business. Abbreviations, notes-to-self, inconsistent formatting.

demos.title: Vintage Camera Collection
demos.description: A well-structured JSON inventory of 10 collectible film cameras with detailed condition notes.

demos.title: Home Decor — Photos Only
demos.description: Just product photos, no spreadsheet or text. The AI will work from the images alone.
